title: (PLEASE HELP) Request to riot regarding aftermath of (stuck in champ select) problem
body:
Could you please reset everyones leaver buster status who were unfairly given warnings/punishments/red flags because of this problem
The leaver buster system is harsh enough as it is without punishing people for things they have no control over.

I had this problem happen to me a few weeks ago and i was given a warning by leaver buster even though i managed to re-connect.
pictures showing the problem in action included (pay attention to the time in the top right corner)
(I'm terrified every time i get the attempting to reconnect warning now, or similar problems, because i don't want to get banned) 
and i don't want other people affected feeling the same.

thanks :)

replies.body:
So in other words, leaver buster is getting you for something that is wrong on your side, and your complaining?

I get that the client sucks ass, but this doesn't happen to everyone, meaning it's not just the client and it's a lack of a stable connection on your part.

its not just me who is being stuck in champ select, others have had this problem too. 
plus i have a wired connection in a stable area, so its highly unlikely that it would be that, especially seeming I'm not the only one.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vkinsMPr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-06T01:52:26.257+0000)
>
> So in other words, leaver buster is getting you for something that is wrong on your side, and your complaining?
> 
> I get that the client sucks ass, but this doesn't happen to everyone, meaning it's not just the client and it's a lack of a stable connection on your part.

As you will notice, if you look at the posts from about 12 hours ago or so... lots of people were having this problem. It is NOT OP's connection.

Which riot fixed i might add, and they were completely aware of said thing and i do believe they retracted all the leaver buster stuff that was had.

I assumed this was a different thing considering the time.
Could you link me to where they say they removed the leaver buster stuff? thanks

As a note i assumed they would have taken it all back (loss prevented was enabled at some time last night) and also this warning you recieved is just a generic "This is a really bad warning" it doesn't mean your close to being busted.

I know I'm not close, im worried that they can bust you even if you re-connect,
I didn't worry at first because I dont leave games so i thought I had nothing to fear, but it seems even if you have a tech issue or something and you re-connect after it is sorted you can still be busted for that, and that's why I'm nervous.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vkinsMPr,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-06T04:48:16.748+0000)
>
> I know I'm not close, im worried that they can bust you even if you re-connect,
> I didn't worry at first because I dont leave games so i thought I had nothing to fear, but it seems even if you have a tech issue or something and you re-connect after it is sorted you can still be busted for that, and that's why I'm nervous.

You have to be disconnected for too long to get a leaverbuster warning though. LIke, my friend crashes whenever he plays Yasuo and has to reconnect and gets in around 1:00 but gets no penalties for that. I don't know what the window for reconnecting is, but there is one.

It's 5 minutes total not actually playing time

Also the attempting to reconnect window doesn't actually disconnect you from league, you have to have that for a decent amount of time before it does.

Can you just get lost already, we don't need you for supporting us troll. All my mates facing this problem. Most of them have fibre connection. It is not like Oceania is a third world country, neither LOL is a game like destiny that require Fibre connection. 

Just get lost, we don't need you troll.
